channel.title: RSCDv25 PunBB Issues
channel.description:
I ended up with Piru's PunBB source, somehow, and there's a few issues when going around the forum. It seems every time I fix one error there's another, and I don't know where they are all coming from since I am not that familiar with PunBB's structure. All of the required SQL is setup and everything connects, however when navigating to certain area's in PunBB I run into problems... Like, when viewing my profile:
An error was encountered Error: Unable to fetch user info.
Not a very specific error report if you ask me, so I'm unsure of where to go. My SQL is setup and the "users" table is there, but I don't know. http://localhost/merge/rscd.php?action=register&agree=Agree Registering an in game account. The page simply gets stuck loading after I enter in the credentials for a new game account to create. Going to "http://localhost/merge/status.php" Status
An error was encountered Error: Unable to fetch total invite count.
Any fixes or a less faulty forum source? Or at least a pointer of what to do? Thanks.

item.title: RSCDv25 PunBB Issues
item.dc:creator: @darscape darscape
item.description:
@darscape wrote:

Open RSCD_v25 v3 already includes this fix among others for the website files at least.

http://sourceforge.net/projects/rscdv25/files/

Read full topic

item.title: RSCDv25 PunBB Issues
item.dc:creator: @ProjectP2P ProjectP2P
item.description:
@ProjectP2P wrote:

lol k:

not sure :S, maybe use project p2p www?

using my webfiles would be hard for new people understand how to use it, considering they’d have to change a few things around in their webfiles or either add things in their client.

If you get what I’m saying.

Read full topic

u l2syntax i gave the fuix for the first problem the second problem would be to add the invite count which should be a 0 as default…

item.title: RSCDv25 PunBB Issues

item.description:
@sw0o0sh wrote:

I ended up with Piru’s PunBB source, somehow, and there’s a few issues when going around the forum. It seems every time I fix one error there’s another, and I don’t know where they are all coming from since I am not that familiar with PunBB’s structure. All of the required SQL is setup and everything connects, however when navigating to certain area’s in PunBB I run into problems…

Like, when viewing my profile:

An error was encountered Error: Unable to fetch user info.

Not a very specific error report if you ask me, so I’m unsure of where to go. My SQL is setup and the “users” table is there, but I don’t know.

http://localhost/merge/rscd.php?action=register&agree=Agree
Registering an in game account.

The page simply gets stuck loading after I enter in the credentials for a new game account to create.

Going to “http://localhost/merge/status.php” Status

An error was encountered Error: Unable to fetch total invite count.

Any fixes or a less faulty forum source? Or at least a pointer of what to do? Thanks.

Read full topic
